definition.text: The master branch in the Superalgos repo features the latest stable version, the develop branch features updates to core functionality, and the plugins/docs branch features updates to non-mission critical plugins and docs.

paragraphs.text: Superalgos is constantly improving. At some point, you may wish to try the software version in the develop branch. Maybe there is a new feature, or a fix for a bug that hasn't got to the master branch yet...
Or you may wish to submit a contribution, which must always be sent to the develop or plugins/docs branch!
Scroll down the Docs page to the footer and select Develop or Plugins/Docs as your Contributions Branch! It's the option on the right-hand side, not in the center!
